# Structure of the repository
The repository consists of three folders: *experiments*, *methods* and *nout*.

Folder *experiments* contains Python code used to run the experiments to illustrate the ACODE method.

Folder *methods* contains Python functions to define models, generate scores and find the lower bound for the number of outliers via Closed Testing with different local tests.


Folder *nout* contains the R package \code{nout} and instructions for download.

## References

Magnani, C. G., Sesia, M. and Solari, A. (2024) Collective Outlier Detection and Enumeration with Conformalized Closed Testing. *arXiv preprint arXiv:2308.05534*
